CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1957, pg. B4 reads: "At The Speakers' Table - Republican leaders on national, state and county levels greeted the new chairman of the Republican National Committee at a Lincoln Day dinner on Feb. 12 in Penn-Sheraton Hotel Ballroom. Shown seated at the speakers' table, left to right: Ralph E. Ord, jury commissioner; U.S. Senator Edward Martin, H. Meade Alcorn, new national chairman; Nelle Dressler, vice chairman, Allegheny County committee; George I. Bloom, State Chairman; Edward L. Flaherty, Allegheny County Chairman; Thomas H. McIntosh, general chairman banquet committee; Verna Wright, vice chairman banquet committee; James F. Malone, former District Attorney, and Chauncey Robbins, executive director, Republican National Committee."
TitMainTitle: Republicans at speaker's table from left: Ralph E. Ord, Senator Edward Martin, H. Meade Alcorn, Nelle Dressler, George I. Bloom, Edward L. Flaherty, Thomas H. McIntosh, Verna Wright, James F. Malone, and Chauncey Robbins, gathered around banquet table for Lincoln Day dinner in Penn-Sheraton Hotel Ballroom
